availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John F. Rodgers (Anderson County, Kentucky, physician and surgeon 11th KY Cav USA)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, physician and surgeon. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Rodgers and Mary Rodgers. Married to Margaret E. Pattie Rodgers in Franklin County, Kentucky, on December 22, 1853. Father of Mary Rogers and Almira Rodgers. Laborer in Scott County, Kentucky, in 1850. Physician in Anderson County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as assistant surgeon from September 18, 1862, to January 4, 1863.

ab.bibl:
